panels.description: Minuten mit Modulation >10 zählen und in 4min-Blöcken addieren.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Laufzeit im selektierten Zeitraum

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4/60*7.8/4.9 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4/60 * 7.8 * 9  FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4/60*7.8*0.05 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT max("se1_L_day") FROM "km4" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4/60 * 7.8 * 9 / 84 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(count("pe1_L_modulation"), 1m) *4/60 * 7.8 / 4.9 * 0.213 FROM "oekofen" WHERE "pe1_L_modulation" >10 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
